Clinical: Brain, congestion of. Fretfulness. Irritability. Sleeplessness.
Characteristics: Calc. bro. is an unproved remedy, recommended by Hale in a variety of children's complaints. Suited to children who are of lax fibre, lymphatic, nervous, and irritable. As both Bromine and Calcarea are suited to fair-haired and fat children the combination appears to intensify the effect. Gastric, intestinal, and cerebral irritation in such children. Vomiting, diarrhoea, sleeplessness, fretfulness, and tendency to brain disease.
